announcements.title: New Mercy Days!
announcements.description: Join us for our Mercy Days on March 29 & August 23. Sign up to volunteer or to request a Mercy project here.

announcements.title: Save the Dates - Spring 2025
announcements.description:
• CPC'S Spring Break - No SS or Lunch - 3/9, 3/16
  • Spring Work Day - 4/12
  • Good Friday - 4/18
  • Easter Egg Hunt - 4/19
  • Easter - 4/20 (with Fellowship meals)
  • I Heart NH Day - 6/7

announcements.title: Life Groups & Discipleship Groups
announcements.description: Restarting for the new year, join now! Talk to a welcome team member about all the groups that meet throughout the city.

announcements.title: Listen to CPC Podcasts!
announcements.description:
• Missed a sermon? Listen to our weekly sermons
  • Dive deeper with "Beyond the Sunday Sermon" weekly discussion
  • Find Adult Sunday Studies in the "Resources" page
Visit cpcnewhaven.org/podcasts to start listening!

announcements.title: Sunday Schedule
announcements.description:

announcements.title: Intro to Spirituality at CPC
announcements.description: New Class during Sunday Lunch in CPC Lecture Room | March 23-April 13 Have questions about CPC and why we do the things we do? Want to hear more about our spirituality and vision for the Christian life? Want to explore with others what itâ€™s like to experience Christ at CPC? These questions and more will be addressed in four 45 minute sessions starting March 23, and will include teaching, discussion, and open Q&A. All are welcome! Grab your lunch and join us in the lecture room!

announcements.title: Women's Discipleship Group | Megan Hill's devotional of contentment
announcements.description: Ladies -Are you interested in joining with other women to dig into your faith, to come alongside, to challenge and encourage one another in Christ? The evening Women's Discipleship Group will be working through Megan Hill's devotional on contentment for the next several months. We meet via Googlemeets the 1st and 3rd Mondays of each month at 7:30pm. For more information contact Lisa Graham lisahgraham44@gmail.com or Diane Miller auntie.diane@comcast.net
